Description: Chrysoprase amulet in the form of an animal, probably a hippopotamus, pierced transversely.
Curator's comments: Illustrated and discussed in M. Horn. A Badarian-Naqadian cognitive link? A possible insight on the basis of a Badarian hippopotamus shaped pendant from Egypt, Polished Archaeology in the Mediterranean 23/2 (2014), 41-70, fig. 2
